curam.core.struct
Class DateRangeTerm

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.type.struct.Struct<DateRangeTerm>
      curam.core.struct.DateRangeTerm
All Implemented Interfaces:
DeepCloneable, java.io.Serializable
public final class DateRangeTerm
extends Struct<DateRangeTerm>

This term is used for data range searches. Searches can be inclusive or exclusive, i.e. beginnig and ending dates can be included or excluded from the search. The dates resolution is year, month, day. Time is not included. The client is responsible to use the same timezone that was used for indexing data initially. Open ended searches are supported on both beginnig and ending dates.

See Also:
